title: Kadhal Cricket Lyrics Thani Oruvan Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Kadhal Cricket Lyrics Thani Oruvan,
Movie:Thani Oruvan,
Singer: Kharesma Ravichandran,
Music: Hiphop Tamizha,
Lyrics: Hiphop Tamizha

Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Kadhal Cricket-u
vilundhurichu wicket-u.
unnai naanum
paathadhaale aaneney
duck out-u. (2)

Romance romance
idhu thaan en chance
en vazhkai un kayyil
irukkudhuda.

unpinnaal naaiaattam
suththuranae.
enna paarthu oore
suththudhadha.

Yenna senja oththukuva
enna nee yeppa yaethukkuva.
ennenne venum sollu
unakkaaga enna maathikkuren.

Periya thoondil
pottu paarthaen
meenu valayil maattaliye.

yelumbu thundu pottu
paarthaen naayum
vazha aattalaye.

thalaikku melae
kovam varudhu
aanalum veli kaattaliye.

Unnakkaaga enna maathikkittaen
aanalum nee madhikkalayae.

Irundhaalum unnai
mattum kadhal seivenae.
Neethaan en boomi
unna suththi varuvaenae.

Kadhal Cricket-u
vilundhurichu wicket-u.
unnai naanum
paathadhaale aaneney
duck out-u.

Azhaga irukkura
ponnunga ellaam
arivaa irukka maattaanga.

Azhaga irukkura
ponnunga unakku alva
koduthuttu povaanga.

Azhagum arivum
kalandhu ulagil
yaarul milla.

Unpinnae naan
suthuradhaal en arumai
unakku puriyavilla.

Kadhal Cricket-u
vilundhurichu wicket-u.
unnai naanum
paathadhaale aaneney
duck out-u		English Meaning
I tried my best :)
It’s love cricket game
a wicket has fallen.
I am a
duck wicket
after seeing you.

Romance Ramance,
its my chance now,
my life is in your
hand.

I’m following like
a dog behind you.
but whole world
is following me.

what should I do to confess you
when will you accept me,
tell me what you want
I will change myself.

I set a large bait
for you,but couldn’t
catch the Fish

I showed a bone
to the dog, but the dog
didn’t shake its tail.

I’m getting angry
but couldn’t
show it off.

 I changed myself for you
but you didn’t respect me.

however, I’ll
always love you.
you’re my earth
I’ll circle around you.

It’s love cricket game
a wicket has fallen.
I am a
duck wicket
after seeing you.

Girl’s
who are beautiful
are fools.

Beautiful girls
will dump you
at any time.

No girls
in this word are both
beautiful and talented

coz I am behind you,
you don’t understand
my awesomeness

It’s love cricket game
a wicket has fallen.
I am a
duck wicket
after seeing you.
